sections.heading: GEORGIA EDUCATION SAVINGS AUTHORITY (§§ 20-2B-1 — 20-2B-8)Article 2 - [Repealed Effective 6/30/2035, or ten years after it becomes effective, whichever is later; provided, however, that any student who is qualified under the program prior to such repeal shall continue to be eligible under the progra
sections.text: GEORGIA EDUCATION SAVINGS AUTHORITY (§§ 20-2B-1 — 20-2B-8)Article 2 - [Repealed Effective 6/30/2035, or ten years after it becomes effective, whichever is later; provided, however, that any student who is qualified under the program prior to such repeal shall continue to be eligible under the program until the student returns to a public school, graduates from high school, or reaches the age of 20 years, or for any special education student, reaches the age of 21 years] GEORGIA PROMISE SCHOLARSHIP ACT (§§ 20-2B-20 — 20-2B-31)

sections.heading: [Repealed Effective 6/30/2035, or ten years after it becomes effective, whichever is later; provided, however, that any student who is qualified under the program prior to such repeal shall continue to be eligible under the program until the student returns to a public school, graduates from high sc
sections.text: [Repealed Effective 6/30/2035, or ten years after it becomes effective, whichever is later; provided, however, that any student who is qualified under the program prior to such repeal shall continue to be eligible under the program until the student returns to a public school, graduates from high school, or reaches the age of 20 years, or for any special education student, reaches the age of 21 years] GEORGIA PROMISE SCHOLARSHIP ACT (§§ 20-2B-20 — 20-2B-31)
